featured.text: This poses special problems for childbearing women, who pass dioxin to an unborn baby or to a breastfeeding baby.
We had better not breastfeed our babies, since babies are most likely to be poisoned by dioxin.

definition.en_def: To feed a baby with milk from a woman's breast.
definition.example: She decided to breastfeed her baby for the first six months.
